channel.title: Need a tut, when eating food, gets out of combat
channel.description:
You know, when you fight, when you eat one food, you don't have to re-click on the player, it just keeps fighting, i want it to bring you out of combat, so after eating, you must - reclick on the player that your fighting....
Would this be possible? thanks
~PARK

item.title: Need a tut, when eating food, gets out of combat
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

well, you got the tut for me?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2007, 06:53:23 PM[/size][hr]Or actually, if you cant find a tut, is it possible to make an int, of clicking on food?

Read full topic
